metadata.name: Furtherance
metadata.description:
[h1]The Binding of Isaac: Furtherance is a modded expansion that adds a flavorful amount of new content![/h1]
[h2]Features[/h2] - 14 Passive Items - 18 Active Items - 4 Trinkets - 2 Characters - 7 Blessings - 1 Curse - Mod Config Menu Support - EID Suppport - Encyclopedia Support - Pog Support - And more to come!
[h3]Supported Languages (With EID)[/h3] - [b]English[/b] - [b]Spanish[/b] - [b]Russian[/b]
[h2]Configuration[/h2]
Simply install [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787]Mod Config Menu[/url]
[b]I strongly recommend you play this mod with EID and Encyclopedia installed![/b] Here is the [url=https://github.com/anchikai/Furtherance]github page[/url] for Furtherance, including a [url=https://github.com/anchikai/Furtherance/wiki]wiki[/url]
[h2]Special Thanks to[/h2] - Blind, the Bound Demon for creating item sprites - BrakeDude for providing the Russian translations - cat,, for making Leah's stage sprites - Goncholito for creating item sprites - Kotry for providing the Spanish translations and thumbnail art - poody_blue for creating item sprites, UI elements, character sprites, costumes, and more - shrkiツ for extensive play testing and feedback, and item sprites - Sillst for providing sfx - Aeronaut, Freg, Joply, PootisTweet, shrkiツ, SybilScribble, and Tesseract for concepts!
